name: THX Network
description: THX Network allows you to create and embed your own ERC-20 and ERC-721 tokens in any app or website, boosting engagement and increasing revenue. Use cases include loyalty programs, the offering of collectibles by creators, cashbacks, and engagement incentives. The $THX governance token lives both on Ethereum and Polygon (formerly Matic). This project has received funding from the European Unionâ€™s Horizon 2020 research and innovation program under agreement No 82888 (Blockpool) and No 824509 (Block.IS).
